fields.name: ğŸ‘‰ Respect & Conduct
fields.value:
â–¸ Treat all guild members and the broader WoW community with respect and courtesy.
â–¸ Griefing, trolling, or intentionally disrupting others' gameplay is not tolerated.
â–¸ Be kind to PUGsâ€”your behavior reflects on the guild.

fields.name: ğŸ‘‰ Humor & Sensitivity
fields.value:
â–¸ Humor is welcome and encouraged! However, if you're offended, speak up respectfully, then let it go. 
â–¸ If someone is offended by your joke: Apologize, then move on.
â–¸ No need to dwellâ€”keep the atmosphere light and inclusive.

fields.name: ğŸ‘‰ Off-Limits Topics in Guild Chat
fields.value:
To maintain a welcoming environment, please avoid the following in guild chat:
â–¸ Sexually explicit content
â–¸ Political discussions
â–¸ Religious debates
â–¸ Racist or discriminatory remarks

fields.name: ğŸ‘‰ Inactivity
fields.value:
â–¸ Members are marked as "inactive" after 3 months of no logins across all linked characters.
â–¸ If you plan to be away, let us know! Weâ€™ll work with you to determine next steps and keep your spot warm.

fields.name: ğŸ‘‰ Inviting New Members
fields.value:
Only invite:
â–¸ Alts of current members.
â–¸ Verified friends of current members.
â–¸ Confirm the name of their main character and notify the Co-GM for proper notes.

fields.name: ğŸ‘‰ Guild Vault Etiquette
fields.value:
The guild vault is a shared resource built by member contributions. Please follow these rules:
â–¸ Withdraw only what you need for the character you're currently playing.
â–¸ Use items on that character only.
â–¸ Do not transfer items to non-guild characters.
â–¸ Do not withdraw items if you're planning to leave the guild.
â–¸ Do not sell or vendor guild vault items.
â–¸ Theft will result in removal and a permanent ban.

fields.name: ğŸ‘‰ Avoiding Cliques
fields.value:
Cliques lead to drama. Weâ€™re here to build a community, not exclusive circles. We want everyone to run content together! Dungeons, raids, mythicsâ€”group play builds camaraderie. When forming groups:
â–¸ Ask in guild chat first.
â–¸ Accept volunteers on a first-come, first-served basis.
â–¸ Avoid private invites unless you're continuing with an existing group.
â–¸ Discord is encouraged for mythics and coordination.

fields.name: ğŸ‘‰ Complaints & Concerns
fields.value:
â–¸ If something bothers you, speak upâ€”privately to the Guild Leader or Co-Founder.
â–¸ Weâ€™d rather fix small issues early than deal with big ones later.
â–¸ Most problems are solvable with communication.

fields.name: ğŸ‘‰ Drama-Free Zone
fields.value:
â–¸ Drama is disruptive and exhausting. Donâ€™t start it, fuel it, or ignore it.
â–¸ If there's a problem, report it privately to leadership.
â–¸ Weâ€™ll handle it swiftly and fairly.

title: Welcome to Compulsion ğŸ‰
description:
We're thrilled to have you here! Compulsion is a World of Warcraft guild built on respect, progression, and community. Before you dive in, please take a moment to read our rules.

   **React with the âœ… emoji below to accept the rules and gain access to the server.**

footer.text: Compulsion - built on trust, forged in battle
